現在創建JavaScript檔案，包含互動功能和動畫：

```javascript
// Travel Blog JavaScript Functionality

// Navigation functionality
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupSmoothScrolling();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupSmoothScrolling() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        const href = link.getAttribute('href');
        if (href && href.startsWith('#')) {
          e.preventDefault();
          const targetId = href.substring(1);
          const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
          if (targetElement) {
            targetElement.scrollIntoView({
              behavior: 'smooth',
              block: 'start'
            });
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }
}

// Theme toggle functionality
class ThemeToggle {
  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.toggleTheme();
      });
      this.loadTheme();
    }
  }

  toggleTheme() {
    this.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode');
    this.saveTheme();
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }

  updateThemeIcon() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        if (this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode')) {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
        } else {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
        }
      }
    }
  }

  saveTheme() {
    const isDarkMode = this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
  }

  loadTheme() {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
    if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
      this.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
      this.updateThemeIcon();
    }
  }
}

// Scroll animations and reveal effects
class ScrollAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    this.travelPosts = document.querySelectorAll('.travel-post');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollObserver();
    this.setupIntersectionObserver();
  }

  setupScrollObserver() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.1,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    });

    this.elements.forEach(element => {
      observer.observe(element);
    });
  }

  setupIntersectionObserver() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
          entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.2,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -100px 0px'
    });

    this.travelPosts.forEach((post, index) => {
      post.style.opacity = '0';
      post.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
      post.style.transition = `all 0.8s ease ${index * 0.2}s`;
      observer.observe(post);
    });
  }
}

// Back to top button functionality
class BackToTop {
  constructor() {
    this.backToTopBtn = document.getElementById('backToTop');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.backToTopBtn) {
      this.setupScrollListener();
      this.setupClickHandler();
    }
  }

  setupScrollListener() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 300) {
        this.backToTopBtn.classList.add('visible');
      } else {
        this.backToTopBtn.classList.remove('visible');
      }
    });
  }

  setupClickHandler() {
    this.backToTopBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      window.scrollTo({
        top: 0,
        behavior: 'smooth'
      });
    });
  }
}

// Parallax effect for hero section
class ParallaxEffect {
  constructor() {
    this.hero = document.querySelector('.hero');
    this.heroContent = document.querySelector('.hero-content');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.hero && this.heroContent) {
      this.setupParallax();
    }
  }

  setupParallax() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      const scrolled = window.pageYOffset;
      const rate = scrolled * -0.5;
    
      if (this.heroContent) {
        this.heroContent.style.transform = `translateY(${rate}px)`;
      }
    });
  }
}

// Image hover effects
class ImageEffects {
  constructor() {
    this.images = document.querySelectorAll('.image-placeholder');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupHoverEffects();
  }

  setupHoverEffects() {
    this.images.forEach(image => {
      image.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        image.style.transform = 'scale(1.05) rotate(1deg)';
      });

      image.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        image.style.transform = 'scale(1) rotate(0deg)';
      });
    });
  }
}

// Day cards interaction
class DayCards {
  constructor() {
    this.dayCards = document.querySelectorAll('.day-card');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupCardInteractions();
  }

  setupCardInteractions() {
    this.dayCards.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // Remove active class from all cards
        this.dayCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));
        // Add active class to clicked card
        card.classList.add('active');
      
        // Add a subtle animation
        card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
        setTimeout(() => {
          card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
        }, 150);
      });

      // Add hover effect
      card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px) scale(1.02)';
      });

      card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
      });
    });
  }
}

// Loading animation
class LoadingAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.showLoading();
    this.hideLoading();
  }

  showLoading() {
    this.body.style.opacity = '0';
    this.body.style.transition = 'opacity 0.5s ease';
  }

  hideLoading() {
    window.addEventListener('load', () => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.body.style.opacity = '1';
      }, 100);
    });
  }
}

// Scroll indicator animation
class ScrollIndicator {
  constructor() {
    this.scrollIndicator = document.querySelector('.scroll-indicator');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.scrollIndicator) {
      this.setupClickHandler();
      this.setupScrollHide();
    }
  }

  setupClickHandler() {
    this.scrollIndicator.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const mainContent = document.querySelector('.main-content');
      if (mainContent) {
        mainContent.scrollIntoView({
          behavior: 'smooth'
        });
      }
    });
  }

  setupScrollHide() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (window.scrollY > 200) {
        this.scrollIndicator.style.opacity = '0';
        this.scrollIndicator.style.visibility = 'hidden';
      } else {
        this.scrollIndicator.style.opacity = '1';
        this.scrollIndicator.style.visibility = 'visible';
      }
    });
  }
}

// Typing animation for hero title
class TypingAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-title');
    this.heroSubtitle = document.querySelector('.hero-subtitle');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.heroTitle && this.heroSubtitle) {
      this.animateText();
    }
  }

  animateText() {
    const titleText = this.heroTitle.textContent;
    const subtitleText = this.heroSubtitle.textContent;
  
    this.heroTitle.textContent = '';
    this.heroSubtitle.textContent = '';
  
    this.heroTitle.style.opacity = '1';
    this.heroSubtitle.style.opacity = '1';
  
    let i = 0;
    const typeTitle = () => {
      if (i < titleText.length) {
        this.heroTitle.textContent += titleText.charAt(i);
        i++;
        setTimeout(typeTitle, 100);
      } else {
        setTimeout(() => {
          this.typeSubtitle(subtitleText);
        }, 500);
      }
    };
  
    setTimeout(typeTitle, 1000);
  }

  typeSubtitle(text) {
    let i = 0;
    const type = () => {
      if (i < text.length) {
        this.heroSubtitle.textContent += text.charAt(i);
        i++;
        setTimeout(type, 50);
      }
    };
    type();
  }
}

// Particle effect for hero section
class ParticleEffect {
  constructor() {
    this.hero = document.querySelector('.hero');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.hero) {
      this.createParticles();
    }
  }

  createParticles() {
    const particleContainer = document.createElement('div');
    particleContainer.className = 'particles';
    particleContainer.style.cssText = `
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      overflow: hidden;
      pointer-events: none;
      z-index: 1;
    `;

    for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
      const particle = document.createElement('div');
      particle.style.cssText = `
        position: absolute;
        width: 2px;
        height: 2px;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
        border-radius: 50%;
        animation: float ${3 + Math.random() * 4}s linear infinite;
        left: ${Math.random() * 100}%;
        top: ${Math.random() * 100}%;
        animation-delay: ${Math.random() * 2}s;
      `;
      particleContainer.appendChild(particle);
    }

    this.hero.appendChild(particleContainer);

    // Add CSS animation
    const style = document.createElement('style');
    style.textContent = `
      @keyframes float {
        0% {
          transform: translateY(100vh) rotate(0deg);
          opacity: 0;
        }
        10% {
          opacity: 1;
        }
        90% {
          opacity: 1;
        }
        100% {
          transform: translateY(-100vh) rotate(360deg);
          opacity: 0;
        }
      }
    `;
    document.head.appendChild(style);
  }
}

// Initialize all functionality when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  new Navigation();
  new ThemeToggle();
  new ScrollAnimations();
  new BackToTop();
  new ParallaxEffect();
  new ImageEffects();
  new DayCards();
  new LoadingAnimation();
  new ScrollIndicator();
  new TypingAnimation();
  new ParticleEffect();

  // Add fade-in class to travel posts for animation
  const travelPosts = document.querySelectorAll('.travel-post');
  travelPosts.forEach(post => {
    post.classList.add('fade-in');
  });

  // Add smooth scrolling to all internal links
  document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
    anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
      if (target) {
        target.scrollIntoView({
          behavior: 'smooth',
          block: 'start'
        });
      }
    });
  });
});

// Add some utility functions
const utils = {
  // Debounce function for performance optimization
  debounce: function(func, wait, immediate) {
    let timeout;
    return function executedFunction() {
      const context = this;
      const args = arguments;
      const later = function() {
        timeout = null;
        if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
      };
      const callNow = immediate && !timeout;
      clearTimeout(timeout);
      timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
    };
  },

  // Throttle function for scroll events
  throttle: function(func, limit) {
    let inThrottle;
    return function() {
      const args = arguments;
      const context = this;
      if (!inThrottle) {
        func.apply(context, args);
        inThrottle = true;
        setTimeout(() => inThrottle = false, limit);
      }
    };
  }
};

// Export for potential use in other scripts
window.TravelBlog = {
  Navigation,
  ThemeToggle,
  ScrollAnimations,
  BackToTop,
  ParallaxEffect,
  ImageEffects,
  DayCards,
  LoadingAnimation,
  ScrollIndicator,
  TypingAnimation,
  ParticleEffect,
  utils
};
```

現在我需要更新script.js以支援基於location.pathname的active狀態。讓我檢查現有的script.js：

我需要在Navigation類中添加基於路徑的active狀態設置。讓我找到Navigation類的定義：

讓我添加一個新方法來設置基於路徑的active狀態：

```javascript
// 導航功能
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupPageNavigation();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupPageNavigation() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetPage = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetPage) {
          this.showPage(targetPage);
          this.setActiveLink(link);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  showPage(pageId) {
    this.pages.forEach(page => {
      page.classList.remove('active');
    });

    const targetPage = document.getElementById(pageId);
    if (targetPage) {
      targetPage.classList.add('active');
    }

    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }

  setActiveLink(activeLink) {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    });
    activeLink.classList.add('active');
  }
}

// 主題切換功能
class ThemeToggle {
  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.toggleTheme();
      });
      this.loadTheme();
    }
  }

  toggleTheme() {
    this.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode');
    this.saveTheme();
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }

  updateThemeIcon() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        if (this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode')) {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
        } else {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
        }
      }
    }
  }

  saveTheme() {
    const isDarkMode = this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
  }

  loadTheme() {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
    if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
      this.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
    }
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }
}

// 技能動畫功能
class SkillAnimator {
  constructor() {
    this.skillBars = document.querySelectorAll('.skill-progress');
    this.hasAnimated = false;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollTrigger();
  }

  setupScrollTrigger() {
    const aboutSection = document.getElementById('about');
    if (!aboutSection) return;

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting && !this.hasAnimated) {
          this.animateSkills();
          this.hasAnimated = true;
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.3 });

    observer.observe(aboutSection);
  }

  animateSkills() {
    this.skillBars.forEach((bar, index) => {
      const width = bar.getAttribute('data-width');
      if (width) {
        setTimeout(() => {
          bar.style.width = width + '%';
        }, index * 200);
      }
    });
  }
}

// 滾動動畫功能
class ScrollAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.observer = null;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollObserver();
    this.observeElements();
  }

  setupScrollObserver() {
    this.observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.1,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    });
  }

  observeElements() {
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    elements.forEach(element => {
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }

  // 添加新元素到觀察列表
  addElements(selector) {
    const newElements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
    newElements.forEach(element => {
      if (!element.classList.contains('fade-in')) {
        element.classList.add('fade-in');
      }
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

// 表單處理功能
class ContactForm {
  constructor() {
    this.form = document.getElementById('contactForm');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.form) {
      this.setupFormValidation();
      this.setupFormSubmission();
    }
  }

  setupFormValidation() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
      input.addEventListener('blur', () => {
        this.validateField(input);
      });

      input.addEventListener('input', () => {
        this.clearFieldError(input);
      });
    });
  }

  validateField(field) {
    const value = field.value.trim();
    let isValid = true;
    let errorMessage = '';

    this.clearFieldError(field);

    if (field.hasAttribute('required') && !value) {
      errorMessage = '此欄位為必填';
      isValid = false;
    } else if (field.type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        errorMessage = '請輸入有效的電子郵件地址';
        isValid = false;
      }
    }

    if (!isValid) {
      this.showFieldError(field, errorMessage);
    }

    return isValid;
  }

  showFieldError(field, message) {
    const errorDiv = document.createElement('div');
    errorDiv.className = 'field-error';
    errorDiv.textContent = message;
    errorDiv.style.cssText = 'color: #e74c3c; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-top: 0.5rem;';
  
    field.style.borderColor = '#e74c3c';
    field.parentNode?.appendChild(errorDiv);
  }

  clearFieldError(field) {
    field.style.borderColor = '#ecf0f1';
    const existingError = field.parentNode?.querySelector('.field-error');
    if (existingError) {
      existingError.remove();
    }
  }

  setupFormSubmission() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    this.form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
    
      const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
      let isFormValid = true;

      inputs.forEach(input => {
        if (!this.validateField(input)) {
          isFormValid = false;
        }
      });

      if (isFormValid) {
        this.submitForm();
      }
    });
  }

  submitForm() {
    this.showSuccessMessage();
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.reset();
    }
  }

  showSuccessMessage() {
    const successDiv = document.createElement('div');
    successDiv.className = 'success-message';
    successDiv.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: #27ae60;
        color: white;
        padding: 1rem;
        border-radius: 10px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
      ">
        <i class="fas fa-check-circle" style="margin-right: 0.5rem;"></i>
        訊息已成功發送！我會盡快回覆您。
      </div>
    `;
  
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.appendChild(successDiv);
    
      setTimeout(() => {
        successDiv.remove();
      }, 3000);
    }
  }
}

// 卡片動畫功能
class CardAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.cards = document.querySelectorAll('.personal-card, .section-card, .travel-card, .contact-card, .project-card, .interest-card');

        card.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px)';

      });
    });
  }
}

// 平滑滾動功能
function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
  const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
  if (section) {
    const nav = new Navigation();
    nav.showPage(sectionId);
  
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
      if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${sectionId}`) {
        link.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

// 旅行詳情頁面功能
function showTravelDetail(travelId) {
  // 隱藏所有頁面
  const allPages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  allPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示對應的旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPage = document.getElementById(`travel-${travelId}`);
  if (travelDetailPage) {
    travelDetailPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加進入動畫
    travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelDetailPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

function goBackToTravel() {
  // 隱藏所有旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPages = document.querySelectorAll('.travel-detail');
  travelDetailPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示旅行列表頁面
  const travelPage = document.getElementById('travel');
  if (travelPage) {
    travelPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加返回動畫
    travelPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = this.createToast();
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  createToast() {
    const toast = document.createElement('div');
    toast.className = 'toast';
    toast.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i><span>已複製</span>';
    toast.style.cssText = `
      position: fixed;
      top: 2rem;
      right: 2rem;
      background: var(--bg-light);
      color: var(--text-color);
      padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 0.75rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
      z-index: 1001;
    `;
    document.body.appendChild(toast);
    return toast;
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  async copyToClipboard(text) {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  showToast() {
    this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
    }, 2000);
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  observeProgressBars() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  animateProgressBar(element) {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

// 照片載入處理
class ProfileImageHandler {
  constructor() {
    this.profilePhoto = document.querySelector('.profile-photo');
    this.imagePlaceholder = document.querySelector('.profile-image .image-placeholder');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('error', () => {
        this.handleImageError();
      });
    
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('load', () => {
        this.handleImageLoad();
      });
    }
  }

  handleImageError() {
    // 照片載入失敗時，隱藏照片並顯示備用圖示
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'none';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'flex';
    }
  }

  handleImageLoad() {
    // 照片載入成功時，確保照片顯示，備用圖示隱藏
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'block';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
```

```javascript
// 導航功能
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupPageNavigation();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupPageNavigation() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetPage = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetPage) {
          this.showPage(targetPage);
          this.setActiveLink(link);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  showPage(pageId) {
    this.pages.forEach(page => {
      page.classList.remove('active');
    });

    const targetPage = document.getElementById(pageId);
    if (targetPage) {
      targetPage.classList.add('active');
    }

    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }

  setActiveLink(activeLink) {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    });
    activeLink.classList.add('active');
  }

  setupActiveState() {
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    
      const href = link.getAttribute('href');
      if (href) {
        // 檢查是否是當前頁面
        if (currentPath === '/' && href === '#home') {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('travel') && href.includes('travel')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('about') && href.includes('about')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('contact') && href.includes('contact')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

  }

  setupFormValidation() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
      input.addEventListener('blur', () => {
        this.validateField(input);
      });

      input.addEventListener('input', () => {
        this.clearFieldError(input);
      });
    });
  }

  validateField(field) {
    const value = field.value.trim();
    let isValid = true;
    let errorMessage = '';

    this.clearFieldError(field);

    if (field.hasAttribute('required') && !value) {
      errorMessage = '此欄位為必填';
      isValid = false;
    } else if (field.type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        errorMessage = '請輸入有效的電子郵件地址';
        isValid = false;
      }
    }

    if (!isValid) {
      this.showFieldError(field, errorMessage);
    }

    return isValid;
  }

  showFieldError(field, message) {
    const errorDiv = document.createElement('div');
    errorDiv.className = 'field-error';
    errorDiv.textContent = message;
    errorDiv.style.cssText = 'color: #e74c3c; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-top: 0.5rem;';
  
    field.style.borderColor = '#e74c3c';
    field.parentNode?.appendChild(errorDiv);
  }

  clearFieldError(field) {
    field.style.borderColor = '#ecf0f1';
    const existingError = field.parentNode?.querySelector('.field-error');
    if (existingError) {
      existingError.remove();
    }
  }

  setupFormSubmission() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    this.form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
    
      const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
      let isFormValid = true;

      inputs.forEach(input => {
        if (!this.validateField(input)) {
          isFormValid = false;
        }
      });

      if (isFormValid) {
        this.submitForm();
      }
    });
  }

  submitForm() {
    this.showSuccessMessage();
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.reset();
    }
  }

  showSuccessMessage() {
    const successDiv = document.createElement('div');
    successDiv.className = 'success-message';
    successDiv.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: #27ae60;
        color: white;
        padding: 1rem;
        border-radius: 10px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
      ">
        <i class="fas fa-check-circle" style="margin-right: 0.5rem;"></i>
        訊息已成功發送！我會盡快回覆您。
      </div>
    `;
  
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.appendChild(successDiv);
    
      setTimeout(() => {
        successDiv.remove();
      }, 3000);
    }
  }
}

// 卡片動畫功能
class CardAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.cards = document.querySelectorAll('.personal-card, .section-card, .travel-card, .contact-card, .project-card, .interest-card');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupHoverEffects();
  }

  setupHoverEffects() {
    this.cards.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px)';
      });

      card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
      });
    });
  }
}

// 平滑滾動功能
function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
  const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
  if (section) {
    const nav = new Navigation();
    nav.showPage(sectionId);
  
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
      if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${sectionId}`) {
        link.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

// 旅行詳情頁面功能
function showTravelDetail(travelId) {
  // 隱藏所有頁面
  const allPages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  allPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示對應的旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPage = document.getElementById(`travel-${travelId}`);
  if (travelDetailPage) {
    travelDetailPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加進入動畫
    travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelDetailPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

function goBackToTravel() {
  // 隱藏所有旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPages = document.querySelectorAll('.travel-detail');
  travelDetailPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示旅行列表頁面
  const travelPage = document.getElementById('travel');
  if (travelPage) {
    travelPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加返回動畫
    travelPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = this.createToast();
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  createToast() {
    const toast = document.createElement('div');
    toast.className = 'toast';
    toast.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i><span>已複製</span>';
    toast.style.cssText = `
      position: fixed;
      top: 2rem;
      right: 2rem;
      background: var(--bg-light);
      color: var(--text-color);
      padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 0.75rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
      z-index: 1001;
    `;
    document.body.appendChild(toast);
    return toast;
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  async copyToClipboard(text) {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  showToast() {
    this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
    }, 2000);
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  observeProgressBars() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  animateProgressBar(element) {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

// 照片載入處理
class ProfileImageHandler {
  constructor() {
    this.profilePhoto = document.querySelector('.profile-photo');
    this.imagePlaceholder = document.querySelector('.profile-image .image-placeholder');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('error', () => {
        this.handleImageError();
      });
    
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('load', () => {
        this.handleImageLoad();
      });
    }
  }

  handleImageError() {
    // 照片載入失敗時，隱藏照片並顯示備用圖示
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'none';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'flex';
    }
  }

  handleImageLoad() {
    // 照片載入成功時，確保照片顯示，備用圖示隱藏
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'block';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
```

現在創建travel.css，使用現代化、簡潔的設計風格：

```css
/* CSS Variables for consistent theming */
:root {
  --primary-color: #3498db;
  --secondary-color: #2c3e50;
  --accent-color: #e74c3c;
  --text-color: #2c3e50;
  --text-light: #7f8c8d;
  --background-color: #ffffff;
  --surface-color: #f8f9fa;
  --border-color: #ecf0f1;
  --shadow-light: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --shadow-medium: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
  --shadow-heavy: 0 10px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  --border-radius: 12px;
  --transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  --gradient-secondary: linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%);
}

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--background-color);
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

/* Navigation - Consistent with main site */
.navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.nav-container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  height: 70px;
}

.nav-logo a {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.nav-logo a:hover {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.nav-menu {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 2rem;
}

.nav-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  color: var(--text-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  transition: var(--transition);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.nav-link:hover,
.nav-link.active {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.theme-toggle {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  color: var(--primary-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: var(--transition);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.theme-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--border-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.hamburger {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0.5rem;
}

.bar {
  width: 25px;
  height: 3px;
  background: var(--secondary-color);
  margin: 3px 0;
  transition: 0.3s;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* Hero Section */
.hero {
  height: 60vh;
  min-height: 500px;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-top: 70px;
}

.hero-background {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-background .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
}

.hero-background .image-placeholder::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: url('data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 1000"><polygon fill="%23ffffff08" points="0,1000 1000,0 1000,1000"/></svg>');
  background-size: cover;
}

.hero-background .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  opacity: 0.8;
}

.hero-content {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
  max-width: 800px;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

.hero-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease 0.5s forwards;
}

.hero-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  opacity: 0.9;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease 0.7s forwards;
}

/* Main Content */
.main-content {
  padding: 4rem 0;
  background: var(--background-color);
}

/* Trips Grid */
.trips-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(350px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 4rem;
}

.trip-card {
  background: var(--background-color);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: var(--transition);
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  animation: fadeInUp 0.8s ease forwards;
}

.trip-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.trip-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.trip-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.trip-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

.trip-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-8px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

.trip-card.featured {
  border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
  position: relative;
}

.trip-card.featured::before {
  content: 'Featured';
  position: absolute;
  top: 1rem;
  right: 1rem;
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  z-index: 2;
}

.trip-image {
  position: relative;
  height: 200px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.trip-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  transition: var(--transition);
  position: relative;
}

.trip-card.coming-soon .trip-image .image-placeholder {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #95a5a6, #7f8c8d);
}

.trip-image .image-placeholder::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.trip-card:hover .trip-image .image-placeholder::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.trip-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

.trip-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.trip-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.trip-card:hover .trip-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
}

.read-more-btn {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: var(--transition);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.read-more-btn:hover {
  background: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.read-more-btn.disabled {
  background: var(--text-light);
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.read-more-btn.disabled:hover {
  transform: none;
}

.trip-content {
  padding: 1.5rem;
}

.trip-meta {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.trip-date {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.trip-location {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.3rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.trip-title {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
  line-height: 1.3;
}

.trip-summary {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.2rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.trip-tags {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.tag {
  background: var(--surface-color);
  color: var(--text-color);
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.tag:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

/* Trip Detail Sections */
.trip-details {
  margin-top: 4rem;
}

.trip-detail {
  background: var(--background-color);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.detail-header {
  padding: 2rem 2rem 1rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  background: var(--border-color);
  color: var(--text-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.6rem 1.2rem;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: var(--transition);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.detail-subtitle {
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 2rem;
  padding: 2rem;
}

.detail-image {
  position: relative;
}

.detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 300px;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  background: var(--gradient-primary);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 3rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.detail-text {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.detail-section h3 {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
}

.detail-section p {
  line-height: 1.7;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.conclusion {
  font-style: italic;
  color: var(--text-light);
  border-left: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  padding-left: 1rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

/* Daily Entries */
.daily-entries {
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.daily-entries h3 {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.day-cards {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
  gap: 1rem;
}

.day-card {
  background: var(--surface-color);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 1rem;
  transition: var(--transition);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  cursor: pointer;
}

.day-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
  border-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.day-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.day-number {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.day-date {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
}

.day-content p {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.coming-soon-text {
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-style: italic;
  padding: 3rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

/* Back to Top Button */
.back-to-top {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 2rem;
  right: 2rem;
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
  transition: var(--transition);
  z-index: 1000;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
}

.back-to-top:hover {
  background: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-heavy);
}

.back-to-top.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  visibility: visible;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: var(--secondary-color);
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: var(--transition);
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideIn {
  from {
    transform: translateX(-100%);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    transform: translateX(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .nav-menu {
    position: fixed;
    left: -100%;
    top: 70px;
    flex-direction: column;
    background-color: white;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 0.3s;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
    padding: 2rem 0;
  }

  .nav-menu.active {
    left: 0;
  }

  .hamburger {
    display: flex;
  }

  .hamburger.active .bar:nth-child(2) {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .hamburger.active .bar:nth-child(1) {
    transform: translateY(8px) rotate(45deg);
  }

  .hamburger.active .bar:nth-child(3) {
    transform: translateY(-8px) rotate(-45deg);
  }

  .hero {
    height: 50vh;
    min-height: 400px;
  }

  .hero-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }

  .hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }

  .trips-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1.5rem;
  }

  .detail-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1.5rem;
  }

  .detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .trip-meta {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .day-cards {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .footer .container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .container {
    padding: 0 15px;
  }

  .hero-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .trip-content,
  .detail-header,
  .detail-content {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .detail-title {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }

  .hero-background .image-placeholder i {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}

/* Dark Mode */
body.dark-mode {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .navbar {
  background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
  border-bottom-color: #333;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link:hover,
body.dark-mode .nav-link.active {
  background: #3498db;
  color: white;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .theme-toggle:hover {
  background: #3d3d3d;
}

body.dark-mode .trip-card,
body.dark-mode .trip-detail {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  border-color: #444;
}

body.dark-mode .trip-title,
body.dark-mode .detail-title {
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .tag,
body.dark-mode .day-card {
  background: #3d3d3d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .footer {
  background: #111;
}
```

現在創建travel.ts檔案，使用TypeScript和ES模組：

```typescript
// Travel Blog TypeScript Module

// Types and Interfaces
interface TripCard {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  date: string;
  location: string;
  summary: string;
  tags: string[];
  featured: boolean;
}

interface NavigationElement extends HTMLElement {
  href: string;
}

// Navigation functionality
class Navigation {
  private navbar: HTMLElement | null;
  private hamburger: HTMLElement | null;
  private navMenu: HTMLElement | null;
  private navLinks: NodeListOf<NavigationElement>;

  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
  
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  private setupScrollEffect(): void {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  private setupMobileMenu(): void {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  private setupActiveState(): void {
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    
      const href = link.getAttribute('href');
      if (href) {
        // Check if it's the current page
        if (currentPath === '/' && href === '#home') {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('travel') && href.includes('travel')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('about') && href.includes('about')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('contact') && href.includes('contact')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

// Theme toggle functionality
class ThemeToggle {
  private themeToggle: HTMLElement | null;
  private body: HTMLElement;

  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.toggleTheme();
      });
      this.loadTheme();
    }
  }

  private toggleTheme(): void {
    this.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode');
    this.saveTheme();
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }

  private updateThemeIcon(): void {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        if (this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode')) {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
        } else {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
        }
      }
    }
  }

  private saveTheme(): void {
    const isDarkMode = this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
  }

  private loadTheme(): void {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
    if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
      this.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
      this.updateThemeIcon();
    }
  }
}

// Scroll animations and reveal effects
class ScrollAnimations {
  private elements: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;
  private tripCards: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;

  constructor() {
    this.elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    this.tripCards = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-card');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupScrollObserver();
    this.setupIntersectionObserver();
  }

  private setupScrollObserver(): void {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.1,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    });

    this.elements.forEach(element => {
      observer.observe(element);
    });
  }

  private setupIntersectionObserver(): void {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
          entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.2,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -100px 0px'
    });

    this.tripCards.forEach((card, index) => {
      card.style.opacity = '0';
      card.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
      card.style.transition = `all 0.8s ease ${index * 0.2}s`;
      observer.observe(card);
    });
  }
}

// Back to top button functionality
class BackToTop {
  private backToTopBtn: HTMLElement | null;

  constructor() {
    this.backToTopBtn = document.getElementById('backToTop');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    if (this.backToTopBtn) {
      this.setupScrollListener();
      this.setupClickHandler();
    }
  }

  private setupScrollListener(): void {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.backToTopBtn) {
        if (window.scrollY > 300) {
          this.backToTopBtn.classList.add('visible');
        } else {
          this.backToTopBtn.classList.remove('visible');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  private setupClickHandler(): void {
    if (this.backToTopBtn) {
      this.backToTopBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        window.scrollTo({
          top: 0,
          behavior: 'smooth'
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

// Trip detail management
class TripDetailManager {
  private tripDetails: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;
  private tripCards: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;

  constructor() {
    this.tripDetails = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-detail');
    this.tripCards = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-card');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.hideAllDetails();
  }

  private hideAllDetails(): void {
    this.tripDetails.forEach(detail => {
      detail.style.display = 'none';
    });
  }

  public showTripDetail(tripId: string): void {
    this.hideAllDetails();
    const targetDetail = document.getElementById(`${tripId}-detail`);
    if (targetDetail) {
      targetDetail.style.display = 'block';
      targetDetail.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
  }

  public hideTripDetail(): void {
    this.hideAllDetails();
    // Scroll back to trips grid
    const tripsGrid = document.querySelector('.trips-grid');
    if (tripsGrid) {
      tripsGrid.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
  }
}

// Image hover effects
class ImageEffects {
  private images: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;

  constructor() {
    this.images = document.querySelectorAll('.image-placeholder');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupHoverEffects();
  }

  private setupHoverEffects(): void {
    this.images.forEach(image => {
      image.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        image.style.transform = 'scale(1.05) rotate(1deg)';
      });

      image.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        image.style.transform = 'scale(1) rotate(0deg)';
      });
    });
  }
}

// Day cards interaction
class DayCards {
  private dayCards: NodeListOf<HTMLElement>;

  constructor() {
    this.dayCards = document.querySelectorAll('.day-card');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.setupCardInteractions();
  }

  private setupCardInteractions(): void {
    this.dayCards.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // Remove active class from all cards
        this.dayCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));
        // Add active class to clicked card
        card.classList.add('active');
      
        // Add a subtle animation
        card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
        setTimeout(() => {
          card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
        }, 150);
      });

      // Add hover effect
      card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px) scale(1.02)';
      });

      card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
      });
    });
  }
}

// Loading animation
class LoadingAnimation {
  private body: HTMLElement;

  constructor() {
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    this.showLoading();
    this.hideLoading();
  }

  private showLoading(): void {
    this.body.style.opacity = '0';
    this.body.style.transition = 'opacity 0.5s ease';
  }

  private hideLoading(): void {
    window.addEventListener('load', () => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.body.style.opacity = '1';
      }, 100);
    });
  }
}

// Typing animation for hero title
class TypingAnimation {
  private heroTitle: HTMLElement | null;
  private heroSubtitle: HTMLElement | null;

  constructor() {
    this.heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-title');
    this.heroSubtitle = document.querySelector('.hero-subtitle');
    this.init();
  }

  private init(): void {
    if (this.heroTitle && this.heroSubtitle) {
      this.animateText();
    }
  }

  private animateText(): void {
    const titleText = this.heroTitle!.textContent;
    const subtitleText = this.heroSubtitle!.textContent;
  
    if (titleText && subtitleText) {
      this.heroTitle!.textContent = '';
      this.heroSubtitle!.textContent = '';
    
      this.heroTitle!.style.opacity = '1';
      this.heroSubtitle!.style.opacity = '1';
    
      let i = 0;
      const typeTitle = () => {
        if (i < titleText.length) {
          this.heroTitle!.textContent += titleText.charAt(i);
          i++;
          setTimeout(typeTitle, 100);
        } else {
          setTimeout(() => {
            this.typeSubtitle(subtitleText);
          }, 500);
        }
      };
    
      setTimeout(typeTitle, 1000);
    }
  }

  private typeSubtitle(text: string): void {
    let i = 0;
    const type = () => {
      if (i < text.length) {
        this.heroSubtitle!.textContent += text.charAt(i);
        i++;
        setTimeout(type, 50);
      }
    };
    type();
  }
}

// Utility functions
const utils = {
  // Debounce function for performance optimization
  debounce: <T extends (...args: any[]) => any>(
    func: T,
    wait: number,
    immediate?: boolean
  ): ((...args: Parameters<T>) => void) => {
    let timeout: NodeJS.Timeout | null = null;
    return function executedFunction(...args: Parameters<T>) {
      const context = this;
      const later = () => {
        timeout = null;
        if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
      };
      const callNow = immediate && !timeout;
      if (timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);
      timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
    };
  },

  // Throttle function for scroll events
  throttle: <T extends (...args: any[]) => any>(
    func: T,
    limit: number
  ): ((...args: Parameters<T>) => void) => {
    let inThrottle: boolean;
    return function executedFunction(...args: Parameters<T>) {
      const context = this;
      if (!inThrottle) {
        func.apply(context, args);
        inThrottle = true;
        setTimeout(() => inThrottle = false, limit);
      }
    };
  }
};

// Global functions for HTML onclick handlers
declare global {
  interface Window {
    showTripDetail: (tripId: string) => void;
    hideTripDetail: () => void;
  }
}

// Initialize all functionality when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const navigation = new Navigation();
  const themeToggle = new ThemeToggle();
  const scrollAnimations = new ScrollAnimations();
  const backToTop = new BackToTop();
  const tripDetailManager = new TripDetailManager();
  const imageEffects = new ImageEffects();
  const dayCards = new DayCards();
  const loadingAnimation = new LoadingAnimation();
  const typingAnimation = new TypingAnimation();

  // Add fade-in class to trip cards for animation
  const tripCards = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-card');
  tripCards.forEach(card => {
    card.classList.add('fade-in');
  });

  // Add smooth scrolling to all internal links
  document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
    anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
      if (target) {
        target.scrollIntoView({
          behavior: 'smooth',
          block: 'start'
        });
      }
    });
  });

  // Expose global functions
  window.showTripDetail = (tripId: string) => {
    tripDetailManager.showTripDetail(tripId);
  };

  window.hideTripDetail = () => {
    tripDetailManager.hideTripDetail();
  };
});

// Export for potential use in other modules
export {
  Navigation,
  ThemeToggle,
  ScrollAnimations,
  BackToTop,
  TripDetailManager,
  ImageEffects,
  DayCards,
  LoadingAnimation,
  TypingAnimation,
  utils
};
```

```html
            <h3>文化感受</h3>
```

```html
    <!-- Tokyo Travel Detail -->
    <section id="travel-tokyo" class="page travel-detail">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="travel-detail-header">
          <button class="back-btn" onclick="goBackToTravel()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i>
            返回旅行列表
          </button>
          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">東京文化之旅</h1>
          <p class="travel-detail-subtitle">2023年12月 • 日本東京</p>
        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-mountain"></i>
              <p>東京夜景</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
          
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Kenting Travel Detail -->
    <section id="travel-kenting" class="page travel-detail">

          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">墾丁夏日假期</h1>

        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-umbrella-beach"></i>
              <p>墾丁海灘</p>
        </div>
      </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>墾丁的夏日假期是我最放鬆的一次旅行。在炎熱的夏天，墾丁的藍天白雲和清澈海水帶給我無比的清涼和愉悅。這次旅行讓我重新認識了台灣南部的美麗，也讓我學會了如何在海邊享受慢生活。</p>
          
            <h3>海灘體驗</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>南灣海灘</strong> - 享受陽光、沙灘和海浪的完美結合</li>
              <li><strong>白沙灣</strong> - 體驗細軟白沙帶來的舒適感受</li>
              <li><strong>後壁湖</strong> - 浮潛觀賞豐富的海洋生態</li>
              <li><strong>關山夕照</strong> - 欣賞墾丁最美的日落景色</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>水上活動</h3>
            <p>在墾丁期間，我嘗試了各種水上活動，包括浮潛、衝浪和帆船。這些活動讓我更加親近海洋，也讓我體驗到了水上運動的刺激和樂趣。</p>

            <h3>在地美食</h3>
            <p>墾丁大街上的各種小吃讓我大飽口福，從新鮮的海鮮到道地的台灣小吃，每一樣都讓我印象深刻。特別是在海邊品嚐的烤魷魚和生魚片，新鮮度令人驚艷。</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

    <!-- Taipei Travel Detail -->
    <section id="travel-taipei" class="page travel-detail">

          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">台北城市探索</h1>

        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-city"></i>
              <p>台北101</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>作為台灣的首都，台北擁有豐富的文化底蘊和現代化的都市風貌。這次城市探索讓我從不同角度認識了台北，從歷史悠久的古蹟到現代化的建築，從傳統的市場到時尚的商圈，每一處都展現了台北的多元魅力。</p>
          
            <h3>文化景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>故宮博物院</strong> - 欣賞中華文化的瑰寶和藝術品</li>
              <li><strong>中正紀念堂</strong> - 了解台灣的歷史和文化</li>
              <li><strong>龍山寺</strong> - 體驗傳統的宗教信仰和建築藝術</li>
              <li><strong>西門町</strong> - 感受年輕人的文化和時尚潮流</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>自然景觀</h3>
            <p>台北不僅有都市的繁華，也有美麗的自然景觀。陽明山的溫泉和花季、象山的夜景、淡水河畔的夕陽，都讓我感受到了台北自然的一面。</p>

            <h3>美食文化</h3>
            <p>台北的美食文化豐富多樣，從夜市小吃到高級餐廳，從傳統台菜到國際料理，每一種都讓我印象深刻。特別是在夜市品嚐的各種小吃，讓我真正體驗到了台灣的飲食文化。</p>

    <!-- Alishan Travel Detail -->
    <section id="travel-alishan" class="page travel-detail">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="travel-detail-header">
          <button class="back-btn" onclick="goBackToTravel()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i>
            返回旅行列表
          </button>
          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">阿里山森林之旅</h1>
          <p class="travel-detail-subtitle">2023年4月 • 台灣阿里山</p>
        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-tree"></i>
              <p>阿里山日出</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>阿里山的森林之旅是我最接近大自然的一次體驗。在海拔2000多公尺的高山上，我感受到了森林的寧靜和神秘，也體驗到了台灣山林的獨特魅力。這次旅行讓我學會了如何在大自然中尋找內心的平靜。</p>
          
            <h3>自然景觀</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>阿里山日出</strong> - 欣賞雲海日出的壯觀景色</li>
              <li><strong>神木群</strong> - 漫步在千年神木林中，感受大自然的偉大</li>
              <li><strong>櫻花季</strong> - 欣賞阿里山櫻花的浪漫美景</li>
              <li><strong>森林步道</strong> - 在森林中健行，呼吸新鮮空氣</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>文化體驗</h3>
            <p>阿里山不僅有美麗的自然景觀，也有豐富的文化內涵。從原住民文化到鐵路文化，從茶文化到森林文化，每一種都讓我對台灣有了更深的認識。</p>

            <h3>心靈收穫</h3>
```

```css
/* CSS Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #550000;
  --secondary-color: #FAF0E6;
  --accent-color: #8B4513;
  --text-color: #2c3e50;
  --text-light: #7f8c8d;
  --bg-color: #FAF0E6;
  --bg-light: #ffffff;
  --border-color: #e8d5c4;
  --shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-hover: 0 5px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.15);
  --radius: 12px;
  --radius-lg: 16px;
}

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--bg-color);
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
}

/* Navigation */
.navbar {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  background: rgba(250, 240, 230, 0.95);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.nav-container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  height: 70px;
}

.nav-logo a {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.nav-logo a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

.nav-menu {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.nav-link:hover,
.nav-link.active {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.nav-link i {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.theme-toggle {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.theme-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--border-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.hamburger {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0.5rem;
}

.bar {
  width: 25px;
  height: 3px;
  background: #2c3e50;
  margin: 3px 0;
  transition: 0.3s;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

/* Main Content */
.main-content {
  margin-top: 70px;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 70px);
}

.page {
  display: none;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  min-height: calc(100vh - 70px);
}

.page.active {
  display: block;
}

.page-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.page-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;

.home-layout {

}

.personal-card {

/* About Page */
.about-layout {
```
