```css
.projects-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-item {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border-left: 4px solid transparent;
}

.project-item:hover {
  background: white;
  border-left-color: #3498db;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.project-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
}

.project-header h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
  flex: 1;
}

.project-type {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.project-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-description {
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.6;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-tech {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.tech-tag {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.achievements-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.achievement-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.achievement-item:hover {
  background: white;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.achievement-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.achievement-content h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.achievement-org {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.achievement-date {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.section-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.section-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.section-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.section-title i {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Timeline */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: #3498db;
}

.timeline-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.timeline-marker {
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: #3498db;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #3498db;
}

.timeline-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.timeline-period {
  color: #3498db;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.achievements {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.achievement {
  background: #f39c12;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Skills */
.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
}

.skill-category h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  width: 60%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Projects */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-image {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.project-content p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Interests */

/* Travel Page */
.travel-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.travel-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 20px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.4s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  min-height: 450px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  opacity: 1; /* 確保可見 */
  visibility: visible; /* 確保可見 */
}

.travel-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-15px) rotateX(5deg);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.travel-image {
  height: 220px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.travel-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.travel-image::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  transform: translateX(-100%);
  transition: transform 0.6s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image::before {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}

.travel-image i {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image i {
  transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
}

.travel-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  color: white;
  padding: 1rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

.travel-content {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.travel-date {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.travel-content p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.travel-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Travel Detail Pages */
.travel-detail {
  display: none;
}

.travel-detail.active {
  display: block;
}

.travel-detail-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.travel-detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.travel-detail-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.travel-detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.travel-detail-image {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  line-height: 1.8;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.travel-detail-text h2 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  position: relative;
}

.travel-detail-text h2::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.travel-detail-text h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.travel-detail-text p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text ul {
  margin: 1rem 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.travel-detail-text li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.travel-detail-text li::before {
  content: '✨';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text strong {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Contact Page */
.contact-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.contact-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.contact-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact-details h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.contact-details p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact-link {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-link:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
}

.contact-form-container {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.contact-form h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px solid #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #3498db;
}

.form-group textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 120px;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

/* Animations */
.fade-in {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.fade-in.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* 確保興趣卡片和旅行卡片在沒有動畫時也可見 */
.interest-card,
.travel-card {
  opacity: 1 !important;
  transform: translateY(0) !important;
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounceIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.3);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  70% {
    transform: scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

/* Enhanced hover effects */
.travel-card,
.info-card,
.experience-section,
.projects-section,
.achievements-section {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.travel-card::after,
.info-card::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.travel-card:hover::after,
.info-card:hover::after {
  left: 100%;
}

/* Staggered animations */
.travel-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.travel-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

.info-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
.info-card:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.info-card:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.info-card:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
.info-card:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hamburger {
    display: flex;
  }

  .nav-menu {
    position: fixed;
    left: -100%;
    top: 70px;
    flex-direction: column;
    background-color: white;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    transition: 0.3s;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 27px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    padding: 2rem 0;
    gap: 0;
  }

  .nav-menu.active {
    left: 0;
  }

  .nav-link {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .home-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .personal-card {
    position: static;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }

  .page-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .contact-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .skills-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .projects-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .interests-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .travel-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  /* About page responsive */
  .about-layout {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .about-left {
    order: 2;
  }

  .about-right {
    order: 1;
  }

  .personal-statement {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .personal-statement h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline {
    padding-left: 1rem;
  }

  .experience-timeline::before {
    left: 0.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item {
    padding-left: 1.5rem;
  }

  .experience-item::before {
    left: -1rem;
  }

  .experience-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .project-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .achievement-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* Travel detail responsive */
  .travel-detail-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-image {
    position: static;
  }

  .travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
    height: 250px;
  }

  .travel-detail-header {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .back-btn {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .travel-detail-text {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  /* Enhanced mobile animations */
  .travel-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }

  .info-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
  }

  .footer .container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .intro-buttons {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .btn {
    text-align: center;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .container {
    padding: 0 15px;
  }

  .personal-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .intro-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }

  .page {
    padding: 1rem 0;
  }

  .section-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }

  .contact-form-container {
    padding: 1.5rem;
  }
}

/* Dark Mode */
body.dark-mode {
  background-color: #1a1a1a;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .navbar {
  background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
}

body.dark-mode .personal-card,
body.dark-mode .section-card,
body.dark-mode .travel-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-card,
body.dark-mode .contact-form-container {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body.dark-mode .nav-link {

/* Travel Blog Styles */
```

```css
/* CSS Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #550000;
  --secondary-color: #FAF0E6;

}

  display: flex;

  gap: 1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.skill-name {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.skill-level {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  flex: 1;
  height: 6px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 3px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 3px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

.skill-percentage {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-weight: 600;
  min-width: 35px;
}

.skill-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.skill-tag {
  background: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);
  color: var(--primary-color);
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: 1px solid rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.skill-tag:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.soft-skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 0.75rem;
}

.soft-skill {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  color: #2c3e50;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.soft-skill:hover {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.education-timeline {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.education-item {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 1.5rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.education-item:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
}

.education-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.education-school {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.education-item h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.education-degree {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.education-period {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.language-skills {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.language-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.language-info {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.language-name {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--text-color);
}

.language-level {
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.progress-bar {
  height: 6px;
  background: var(--border-color);
  border-radius: 3px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.progress-fill {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 3px;
  width: 0%;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-out;
}

.personal-statement {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.personal-statement::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: -50%;
  right: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 70%);
  animation: float 6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.personal-statement h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.personal-statement .title {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  opacity: 0.9;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.personal-statement .statement {
  line-height: 1.8;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.experience-section,
.projects-section,
.achievements-section {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.experience-section:hover,
.projects-section:hover,
.achievements-section:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.section-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  position: relative;
}

.section-title::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 50px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.section-title i {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.experience-timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.experience-timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
}

.experience-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.experience-item::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: var(--primary-color);
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid var(--bg-light);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--primary-color);
}

.experience-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.experience-header h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.experience-company {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.experience-details {
  margin-left: 0;
}

.experience-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.experience-location {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.experience-responsibilities {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.experience-responsibilities li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.experience-responsibilities li::before {
  content: '▶';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.projects-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-item {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border-left: 4px solid transparent;
}

.project-item:hover {
  background: white;
  border-left-color: #3498db;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.project-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
}

.project-header h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
  flex: 1;
}

.project-type {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.project-period {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-description {
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.6;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-tech {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.tech-tag {
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 15px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.achievements-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.achievement-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.achievement-item:hover {
  background: white;
  transform: translateX(5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.achievement-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.achievement-content h4 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.achievement-org {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.achievement-date {
  color: #7f8c8d;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.section-card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.section-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.section-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.section-title i {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Timeline */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
}

.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 1rem;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: #3498db;
}

.timeline-item {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.timeline-marker {
  position: absolute;
  left: -1.5rem;
  top: 0.5rem;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: #3498db;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #3498db;
}

.timeline-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.timeline-period {
  color: #3498db;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.achievements {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.achievement {
  background: #f39c12;
  color: white;
  padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Skills */
.skills-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
}

.skill-category h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.skill-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.skill-bar {
  width: 60%;
  height: 8px;
  background: #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 4px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.skill-progress {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 0;
  transition: width 1.5s ease-in-out;
}

/* Projects */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-image {
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-content h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.project-content p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Interests */

/* Travel Page */
.travel-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.travel-card {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  border-radius: 20px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all 0.4s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  border: 3px solid var(--primary-color);
  min-height: 450px;
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  opacity: 1; /* 確保可見 */
  visibility: visible; /* 確保可見 */
}

.travel-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-15px) rotateX(5deg);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.travel-image {
  height: 220px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.travel-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.travel-image::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  transform: translateX(-100%);
  transition: transform 0.6s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image::before {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}

.travel-image i {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-image i {
  transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
}

.travel-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  color: white;
  padding: 1rem;
  border-radius: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

.travel-content {
  padding: 2rem;
  position: relative;
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-card:hover .travel-content h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

.travel-date {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.travel-content p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.travel-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

/* Travel Detail Pages */
.travel-detail {
  display: none;
}

.travel-detail.active {
  display: block;
}

.travel-detail-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  position: relative;
}

.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  background: var(--primary-color);
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.travel-detail-title {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
}

.travel-detail-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.travel-detail-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.travel-detail-image {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 400px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
}

.travel-detail-image .image-placeholder i {
  font-size: 4rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text {
  background: var(--bg-light);
  padding: 2.5rem;
  border-radius: 20px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(85, 0, 0, 0.1);
  line-height: 1.8;
  border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
}

.travel-detail-text h2 {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  position: relative;
}

.travel-detail-text h2::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-color), var(--accent-color));
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.travel-detail-text h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.travel-detail-text p {
  color: var(--text-light);
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text ul {
  margin: 1rem 0;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.travel-detail-text li {
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.travel-detail-text li::before {
  content: '✨';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.travel-detail-text strong {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Contact Page */
.contact-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 3rem;
  align-items: start;
}

.contact-info {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.contact-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.contact-icon {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.contact-details h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.contact-details p {
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.contact-link {
  color: #3498db;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-link:hover {
  color: #2980b9;
}

.contact-form-container {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.contact-form h3 {
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px solid #ecf0f1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;
  font-family: inherit;
}

.form-group input:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #3498db;
}

.form-group textarea {
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 120px;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
  background: #2c3e50;
  color: white;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.footer .container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social {
  display: flex;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.footer-social a {
  color: white;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.footer-social a:hover {
  color: #3498db;
}

/* Animations */
.fade-in {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}

.fade-in.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* 確保興趣卡片和旅行卡片在沒有動畫時也可見 */
.interest-card,
.travel-card {
  opacity: 1 !important;
  transform: translateY(0) !important;
}

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: translateY(0px) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(50px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounceIn {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.3);
  }
  50% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
  70% {
    transform: scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

/* Enhanced hover effects */
.travel-card,

  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

}

.travel-card:hover::after,

  left: 100%;
}

/* Staggered animations */
.travel-card:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
```

現在我需要在script.js中添加旅行詳情的功能。讓我添加相應的JavaScript功能：

```javascript
// 導航功能
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupPageNavigation();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupPageNavigation() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetPage = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetPage) {
          this.showPage(targetPage);
          this.setActiveLink(link);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  showPage(pageId) {
    this.pages.forEach(page => {
      page.classList.remove('active');
    });

    const targetPage = document.getElementById(pageId);
    if (targetPage) {
      targetPage.classList.add('active');
    }

    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }

  setActiveLink(activeLink) {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    });
    activeLink.classList.add('active');
  }

  setupActiveState() {
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    
      const href = link.getAttribute('href');
      if (href) {
        // 檢查是否是當前頁面
        if (currentPath === '/' && href === '#home') {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('travel') && href.includes('travel')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('about') && href.includes('about')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('contact') && href.includes('contact')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

// 主題切換功能
class ThemeToggle {
  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.toggleTheme();
      });
      this.loadTheme();
    }
  }

  toggleTheme() {
    this.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode');
    this.saveTheme();
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }

  updateThemeIcon() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        if (this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode')) {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
        } else {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
        }
      }
    }
  }

  saveTheme() {
    const isDarkMode = this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
  }

  loadTheme() {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
    if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
      this.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
    }
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }
}

// 技能動畫功能
class SkillAnimator {
  constructor() {
    this.skillBars = document.querySelectorAll('.skill-progress');
    this.hasAnimated = false;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollTrigger();
  }

  setupScrollTrigger() {
    const aboutSection = document.getElementById('about');
    if (!aboutSection) return;

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting && !this.hasAnimated) {
          this.animateSkills();
          this.hasAnimated = true;
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.3 });

    observer.observe(aboutSection);
  }

  animateSkills() {
    this.skillBars.forEach((bar, index) => {
      const width = bar.getAttribute('data-width');
      if (width) {
        setTimeout(() => {
          bar.style.width = width + '%';
        }, index * 200);
      }
    });
  }
}

// 滾動動畫功能
class ScrollAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.observer = null;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollObserver();
    this.observeElements();
  }

  setupScrollObserver() {
    this.observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.1,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    });
  }

  observeElements() {
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    elements.forEach(element => {
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }

  // 添加新元素到觀察列表
  addElements(selector) {
    const newElements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
    newElements.forEach(element => {
      if (!element.classList.contains('fade-in')) {
        element.classList.add('fade-in');
      }
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

// 表單處理功能
class ContactForm {
  constructor() {
    this.form = document.getElementById('contactForm');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.form) {
      this.setupFormValidation();
      this.setupFormSubmission();
    }
  }

  setupFormValidation() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
      input.addEventListener('blur', () => {
        this.validateField(input);
      });

      input.addEventListener('input', () => {
        this.clearFieldError(input);
      });
    });
  }

  validateField(field) {
    const value = field.value.trim();
    let isValid = true;
    let errorMessage = '';

    this.clearFieldError(field);

    if (field.hasAttribute('required') && !value) {
      errorMessage = '此欄位為必填';
      isValid = false;
    } else if (field.type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        errorMessage = '請輸入有效的電子郵件地址';
        isValid = false;
      }
    }

    if (!isValid) {
      this.showFieldError(field, errorMessage);
    }

    return isValid;
  }

  showFieldError(field, message) {
    const errorDiv = document.createElement('div');
    errorDiv.className = 'field-error';
    errorDiv.textContent = message;
    errorDiv.style.cssText = 'color: #e74c3c; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-top: 0.5rem;';
  
    field.style.borderColor = '#e74c3c';
    field.parentNode?.appendChild(errorDiv);
  }

  clearFieldError(field) {
    field.style.borderColor = '#ecf0f1';
    const existingError = field.parentNode?.querySelector('.field-error');
    if (existingError) {
      existingError.remove();
    }
  }

  setupFormSubmission() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    this.form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
    
      const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
      let isFormValid = true;

      inputs.forEach(input => {
        if (!this.validateField(input)) {
          isFormValid = false;
        }
      });

      if (isFormValid) {
        this.submitForm();
      }
    });
  }

  submitForm() {
    this.showSuccessMessage();
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.reset();
    }
  }

  showSuccessMessage() {
    const successDiv = document.createElement('div');
    successDiv.className = 'success-message';
    successDiv.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: #27ae60;
        color: white;
        padding: 1rem;
        border-radius: 10px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
      ">
        <i class="fas fa-check-circle" style="margin-right: 0.5rem;"></i>
        訊息已成功發送！我會盡快回覆您。
      </div>
    `;
  
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.appendChild(successDiv);
    
      setTimeout(() => {
        successDiv.remove();
      }, 3000);
    }
  }
}

function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
  const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
  if (section) {
    const nav = new Navigation();
    nav.showPage(sectionId);
  
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
      if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${sectionId}`) {
        link.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

  // 隱藏所有頁面
  const allPages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  allPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示對應的旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPage = document.getElementById(`travel-${travelId}`);
  if (travelDetailPage) {
    travelDetailPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加進入動畫

    travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelDetailPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = this.createToast();
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  createToast() {
    const toast = document.createElement('div');
    toast.className = 'toast';
    toast.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i><span>已複製</span>';
    toast.style.cssText = `
      position: fixed;
      top: 2rem;
      right: 2rem;
      background: var(--bg-light);
      color: var(--text-color);
      padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 0.75rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
      z-index: 1001;
    `;
    document.body.appendChild(toast);
    return toast;
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  async copyToClipboard(text) {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  showToast() {
    this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
    }, 2000);
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  observeProgressBars() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  animateProgressBar(element) {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('load', () => {
        this.handleImageLoad();
      });

      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'none';

      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'flex';

    // 照片載入成功時，確保照片顯示，備用圖示隱藏
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'block';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
```

```javascript
// 導航功能
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupPageNavigation();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupPageNavigation() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetPage = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetPage) {
          this.showPage(targetPage);
          this.setActiveLink(link);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  showPage(pageId) {
    this.pages.forEach(page => {
      page.classList.remove('active');
    });

    const targetPage = document.getElementById(pageId);
    if (targetPage) {
      targetPage.classList.add('active');
    }

    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }

  setActiveLink(activeLink) {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    });
    activeLink.classList.add('active');
  }

  setupActiveState() {
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    
      const href = link.getAttribute('href');
      if (href) {
        // 檢查是否是當前頁面
        if (currentPath === '/' && href === '#home') {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('travel') && href.includes('travel')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('about') && href.includes('about')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('contact') && href.includes('contact')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

    const newElements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
    newElements.forEach(element => {
      if (!element.classList.contains('fade-in')) {
        element.classList.add('fade-in');
      }
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

// 表單處理功能
class ContactForm {
  constructor() {
    this.form = document.getElementById('contactForm');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.form) {
      this.setupFormValidation();
      this.setupFormSubmission();
    }
  }

  setupFormValidation() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
      input.addEventListener('blur', () => {
        this.validateField(input);
      });

      input.addEventListener('input', () => {
        this.clearFieldError(input);
      });
    });
  }

  validateField(field) {
    const value = field.value.trim();
    let isValid = true;
    let errorMessage = '';

    this.clearFieldError(field);

    if (field.hasAttribute('required') && !value) {
      errorMessage = '此欄位為必填';
      isValid = false;
    } else if (field.type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        errorMessage = '請輸入有效的電子郵件地址';
        isValid = false;
      }
    }

    if (!isValid) {
      this.showFieldError(field, errorMessage);
    }

    return isValid;
  }

  showFieldError(field, message) {
    const errorDiv = document.createElement('div');
    errorDiv.className = 'field-error';
    errorDiv.textContent = message;
    errorDiv.style.cssText = 'color: #e74c3c; font-size: 0.9rem; margin-top: 0.5rem;';
  
    field.style.borderColor = '#e74c3c';
    field.parentNode?.appendChild(errorDiv);
  }

  clearFieldError(field) {
    field.style.borderColor = '#ecf0f1';
    const existingError = field.parentNode?.querySelector('.field-error');
    if (existingError) {
      existingError.remove();
    }
  }

  setupFormSubmission() {
    if (!this.form) return;

    this.form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
    
      const inputs = this.form.querySelectorAll('input, textarea');
      let isFormValid = true;

      inputs.forEach(input => {
        if (!this.validateField(input)) {
          isFormValid = false;
        }
      });

      if (isFormValid) {
        this.submitForm();
      }
    });
  }

  submitForm() {
    this.showSuccessMessage();
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.reset();
    }
  }

  showSuccessMessage() {
    const successDiv = document.createElement('div');
    successDiv.className = 'success-message';
    successDiv.innerHTML = `
      <div style="
        background: #27ae60;
        color: white;
        padding: 1rem;
        border-radius: 10px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 1rem;
        animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;
      ">
        <i class="fas fa-check-circle" style="margin-right: 0.5rem;"></i>
        訊息已成功發送！我會盡快回覆您。
      </div>
    `;
  
    if (this.form) {
      this.form.appendChild(successDiv);
    
      setTimeout(() => {
        successDiv.remove();
      }, 3000);
    }
  }
}

function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
  const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
  if (section) {
    const nav = new Navigation();
    nav.showPage(sectionId);
  
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
      if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${sectionId}`) {
        link.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

function showTravelDetail(travelId) {

  const allPages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  allPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示對應的旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPage = document.getElementById(`travel-${travelId}`);

    travelDetailPage.classList.add('active');

    travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '0';

      travelDetailPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = this.createToast();
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  createToast() {
    const toast = document.createElement('div');
    toast.className = 'toast';
    toast.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i><span>已複製</span>';
    toast.style.cssText = `
      position: fixed;
      top: 2rem;
      right: 2rem;
      background: var(--bg-light);
      color: var(--text-color);
      padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 0.75rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
      z-index: 1001;
    `;
    document.body.appendChild(toast);
    return toast;
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  async copyToClipboard(text) {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  showToast() {
    this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
    }, 2000);
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  observeProgressBars() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  animateProgressBar(element) {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

class ProfileImageHandler {

      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'flex';

  handleImageLoad() {
    // 照片載入成功時，確保照片顯示，備用圖示隱藏
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'block';

    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
```

```javascript
// 導航功能
class Navigation {
  constructor() {
    this.navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
    this.hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
    this.navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
    this.navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    this.pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollEffect();
    this.setupMobileMenu();
    this.setupPageNavigation();
    this.setupActiveState();
  }

  setupScrollEffect() {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      if (this.navbar) {
        if (window.scrollY > 100) {
          this.navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
        } else {
          this.navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
        }
      }
    });
  }

  setupMobileMenu() {
    if (this.hamburger && this.navMenu) {
      this.hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.hamburger?.classList.toggle('active');
        this.navMenu?.classList.toggle('active');
      });

      this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', () => {
          this.hamburger?.classList.remove('active');
          this.navMenu?.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }
  }

  setupPageNavigation() {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const targetPage = link.getAttribute('href')?.substring(1);
        if (targetPage) {
          this.showPage(targetPage);
          this.setActiveLink(link);
        }
      });
    });
  }

  showPage(pageId) {
    this.pages.forEach(page => {
      page.classList.remove('active');
    });

    const targetPage = document.getElementById(pageId);
    if (targetPage) {
      targetPage.classList.add('active');
    }

    window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
  }

  setActiveLink(activeLink) {
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    });
    activeLink.classList.add('active');
  }

  setupActiveState() {
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  
    this.navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
    
      const href = link.getAttribute('href');
      if (href) {
        // 檢查是否是當前頁面
        if (currentPath === '/' && href === '#home') {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('travel') && href.includes('travel')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('about') && href.includes('about')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        } else if (currentPath.includes('contact') && href.includes('contact')) {
          link.classList.add('active');
        }
      }
    });
  }
}

// 主題切換功能
class ThemeToggle {
  constructor() {
    this.themeToggle = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
    this.body = document.body;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      this.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        this.toggleTheme();
      });
      this.loadTheme();
    }
  }

  toggleTheme() {
    this.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode');
    this.saveTheme();
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }

  updateThemeIcon() {
    if (this.themeToggle) {
      const icon = this.themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (icon) {
        if (this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode')) {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
        } else {
          icon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
        }
      }
    }
  }

  saveTheme() {
    const isDarkMode = this.body.classList.contains('dark-mode');
    localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
  }

  loadTheme() {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
    if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
      this.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
    }
    this.updateThemeIcon();
  }
}

// 技能動畫功能
class SkillAnimator {
  constructor() {
    this.skillBars = document.querySelectorAll('.skill-progress');
    this.hasAnimated = false;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollTrigger();
  }

  setupScrollTrigger() {
    const aboutSection = document.getElementById('about');
    if (!aboutSection) return;

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting && !this.hasAnimated) {
          this.animateSkills();
          this.hasAnimated = true;
        }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.3 });

    observer.observe(aboutSection);
  }

  animateSkills() {
    this.skillBars.forEach((bar, index) => {
      const width = bar.getAttribute('data-width');
      if (width) {
        setTimeout(() => {
          bar.style.width = width + '%';
        }, index * 200);
      }
    });
  }
}

// 滾動動畫功能
class ScrollAnimations {
  constructor() {
    this.observer = null;
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupScrollObserver();
    this.observeElements();
  }

  setupScrollObserver() {
    this.observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
          entry.target.classList.add('visible');
        }
      });
    }, { 
      threshold: 0.1,
      rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    });
  }

  observeElements() {
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.fade-in');
    elements.forEach(element => {
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }

  // 添加新元素到觀察列表
  addElements(selector) {
    const newElements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
    newElements.forEach(element => {
      if (!element.classList.contains('fade-in')) {
        element.classList.add('fade-in');
      }
      this.observer.observe(element);
    });
  }
}

    inputs.forEach(input => {

    const value = field.value.trim();
    let isValid = true;
    let errorMessage = '';

    this.clearFieldError(field);

    if (field.hasAttribute('required') && !value) {
      errorMessage = '此欄位為必填';
      isValid = false;
    } else if (field.type === 'email' && value) {
      const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
      if (!emailRegex.test(value)) {
        errorMessage = '請輸入有效的電子郵件地址';
        isValid = false;

// 平滑滾動功能
function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
  const section = document.getElementById(sectionId);
  if (section) {
    const nav = new Navigation();
    nav.showPage(sectionId);
  
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    navLinks.forEach(link => {
      link.classList.remove('active');
      if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${sectionId}`) {
        link.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

function showTravelDetail(travelId) {
  // 隱藏所有頁面
  const allPages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  allPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示對應的旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPage = document.getElementById(`travel-${travelId}`);
  if (travelDetailPage) {
    travelDetailPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加進入動畫
    travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelDetailPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelDetailPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelDetailPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

function goBackToTravel() {
  // 隱藏所有旅行詳情頁面
  const travelDetailPages = document.querySelectorAll('.travel-detail');
  travelDetailPages.forEach(page => {
    page.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // 顯示旅行列表頁面
  const travelPage = document.getElementById('travel');
  if (travelPage) {
    travelPage.classList.add('active');
  
    // 添加返回動畫
    travelPage.style.opacity = '0';
    travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(30px)';
  
    setTimeout(() => {
      travelPage.style.transition = 'all 0.6s ease';
      travelPage.style.opacity = '1';
      travelPage.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    }, 100);
  }
}

// Clipboard Helper Module
class ClipboardHelper {
  constructor() {
    this.copyButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.copy-btn');
    this.toast = this.createToast();
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupEventListeners();
  }

  createToast() {
    const toast = document.createElement('div');
    toast.className = 'toast';
    toast.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i><span>已複製</span>';
    toast.style.cssText = `
      position: fixed;
      top: 2rem;
      right: 2rem;
      background: var(--bg-light);
      color: var(--text-color);
      padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
      border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 0.75rem;
      font-weight: 500;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
      z-index: 1001;
    `;
    document.body.appendChild(toast);
    return toast;
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    this.copyButtons.forEach((button) => {
      button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        const contactItem = button.closest('.contact-item');
        if (contactItem) {
          const textToCopy = contactItem.getAttribute('data-copy');
          if (textToCopy) {
            this.copyToClipboard(textToCopy);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  async copyToClipboard(text) {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
      this.showToast();
    } catch (err) {
      console.error('Failed to copy text: ', err);
    }
  }

  showToast() {
    this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(0)';
    setTimeout(() => {
      this.toast.style.transform = 'translateX(100%)';
    }, 2000);
  }
}

// Progress Bar Animation Module
class ProgressBarAnimation {
  constructor() {
    this.progressBars = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.observeProgressBars();
  }

  observeProgressBars() {
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
      (entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            this.animateProgressBar(entry.target);
          }
        });
      },
      {
        threshold: 0.5
      }
    );

    this.progressBars.forEach((bar) => {
      observer.observe(bar);
    });
  }

  animateProgressBar(element) {
    const width = element.getAttribute('data-width');
    if (width) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        element.style.width = width + '%';
      }, 200);
    }
  }
}

// 照片載入處理
class ProfileImageHandler {
  constructor() {
    this.profilePhoto = document.querySelector('.profile-photo');
    this.imagePlaceholder = document.querySelector('.profile-image .image-placeholder');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('error', () => {
        this.handleImageError();
      });
    
      this.profilePhoto.addEventListener('load', () => {
        this.handleImageLoad();
      });
    }
  }

  handleImageError() {
    // 照片載入失敗時，隱藏照片並顯示備用圖示
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'none';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'flex';
    }
  }

  handleImageLoad() {
    // 照片載入成功時，確保照片顯示，備用圖示隱藏
    if (this.profilePhoto) {
      this.profilePhoto.style.display = 'block';
    }
    if (this.imagePlaceholder) {
      this.imagePlaceholder.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}

// 旅行詳情管理
class TripDetailManager {
  constructor() {
    this.tripDetails = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-detail');
    this.tripCards = document.querySelectorAll('.trip-card');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.hideAllDetails();
  }

  hideAllDetails() {
    this.tripDetails.forEach(detail => {
      detail.style.display = 'none';
    });
  }

  showTripDetail(tripId) {
    this.hideAllDetails();
    const targetDetail = document.getElementById(`${tripId}-detail`);
    if (targetDetail) {
      targetDetail.style.display = 'block';
      targetDetail.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
  }

  hideTripDetail() {
    this.hideAllDetails();
    // Scroll back to trips grid
    const tripsGrid = document.querySelector('.trips-grid');
    if (tripsGrid) {
      tripsGrid.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
    }
  }
}

// 日期卡片互動
class DayCards {
  constructor() {
    this.dayCards = document.querySelectorAll('.day-card');
    this.init();
  }

  init() {
    this.setupCardInteractions();
  }

  setupCardInteractions() {
    this.dayCards.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // Remove active class from all cards
        this.dayCards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));
        // Add active class to clicked card
        card.classList.add('active');
      
        // Add a subtle animation
        card.style.transform = 'scale(0.95)';
        setTimeout(() => {
          card.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
        }, 150);
      });

      // Add hover effect
      card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px) scale(1.02)';
      });

      card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        card.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
      });
    });
  }
}
```

```html
    <section id="travel-tokyo" class="page travel-detail">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="travel-detail-header">
          <button class="back-btn" onclick="goBackToTravel()">
            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left"></i>
            返回旅行列表
          </button>
          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">東京文化之旅</h1>
          <p class="travel-detail-subtitle">2023年12月 • 日本東京</p>
        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-mountain"></i>
              <p>東京夜景</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>這次東京之旅是我第一次踏上日本的土地，充滿了期待和興奮。在為期7天的旅程中，我深入體驗了東京這座現代化都市的獨特魅力，從傳統的淺草寺到現代的東京鐵塔，從繁華的銀座到寧靜的皇居，每一處都留下了深刻的印象。</p>
          
            <h3>主要景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>淺草寺</strong> - 體驗傳統日本文化，感受古老的寺廟氛圍</li>
              <li><strong>東京鐵塔</strong> - 俯瞰整個東京市區，欣賞壯觀的城市景觀</li>
              <li><strong>銀座</strong> - 感受現代東京的繁華與時尚</li>
              <li><strong>皇居</strong> - 在都市中尋找寧靜，欣賞傳統日式庭園</li>
              <li><strong>新宿</strong> - 體驗東京的夜生活和購物文化</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>美食體驗</h3>
            <p>在東京期間，我品嚐了各種道地的日式料理，從街邊的章魚燒到高級的懷石料理，每一道菜都展現了日本料理的精緻和用心。特別是在築地市場品嚐的新鮮壽司，至今仍讓我回味無窮。</p>

            <h3>文化感受</h3>
            <p>這次旅行讓我深刻感受到日本文化的獨特魅力。從人們的禮貌和秩序，到建築的設計和美學，每一個細節都體現了日本文化的精緻和用心。這也讓我更加欣賞不同文化的多元性。</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>墾丁的夏日假期是我最放鬆的一次旅行。在炎熱的夏天，墾丁的藍天白雲和清澈海水帶給我無比的清涼和愉悅。這次旅行讓我重新認識了台灣南部的美麗，也讓我學會了如何在海邊享受慢生活。</p>
          
            <h3>海灘體驗</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>南灣海灘</strong> - 享受陽光、沙灘和海浪的完美結合</li>
              <li><strong>白沙灣</strong> - 體驗細軟白沙帶來的舒適感受</li>
              <li><strong>後壁湖</strong> - 浮潛觀賞豐富的海洋生態</li>
              <li><strong>關山夕照</strong> - 欣賞墾丁最美的日落景色</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>水上活動</h3>
            <p>在墾丁期間，我嘗試了各種水上活動，包括浮潛、衝浪和帆船。這些活動讓我更加親近海洋，也讓我體驗到了水上運動的刺激和樂趣。</p>

            <h3>在地美食</h3>
            <p>墾丁大街上的各種小吃讓我大飽口福，從新鮮的海鮮到道地的台灣小吃，每一樣都讓我印象深刻。特別是在海邊品嚐的烤魷魚和生魚片，新鮮度令人驚艷。</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

          <h1 class="travel-detail-title">台北城市探索</h1>
          <p class="travel-detail-subtitle">2023年6月 • 台灣台北</p>
        </div>

        <div class="travel-detail-content">
          <div class="travel-detail-image">
            <div class="image-placeholder">
              <i class="fas fa-city"></i>
              <p>台北101</p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="travel-detail-text">
            <h2>旅程概述</h2>
            <p>作為台灣的首都，台北擁有豐富的文化底蘊和現代化的都市風貌。這次城市探索讓我從不同角度認識了台北，從歷史悠久的古蹟到現代化的建築，從傳統的市場到時尚的商圈，每一處都展現了台北的多元魅力。</p>
          
            <h3>文化景點</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>故宮博物院</strong> - 欣賞中華文化的瑰寶和藝術品</li>
              <li><strong>中正紀念堂</strong> - 了解台灣的歷史和文化</li>
              <li><strong>龍山寺</strong> - 體驗傳統的宗教信仰和建築藝術</li>
              <li><strong>西門町</strong> - 感受年輕人的文化和時尚潮流</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>自然景觀</h3>
            <p>台北不僅有都市的繁華，也有美麗的自然景觀。陽明山的溫泉和花季、象山的夜景、淡水河畔的夕陽，都讓我感受到了台北自然的一面。</p>

            <h3>美食文化</h3>
            <p>台北的美食文化豐富多樣，從夜市小吃到高級餐廳，從傳統台菜到國際料理，每一種都讓我印象深刻。特別是在夜市品嚐的各種小吃，讓我真正體驗到了台灣的飲食文化。</p>

            <p>阿里山的森林之旅是我最接近大自然的一次體驗。在海拔2000多公尺的高山上，我感受到了森林的寧靜和神秘，也體驗到了台灣山林的獨特魅力。這次旅行讓我學會了如何在大自然中尋找內心的平靜。</p>
          
            <h3>自然景觀</h3>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>阿里山日出</strong> - 欣賞雲海日出的壯觀景色</li>

              <li><strong>櫻花季</strong> - 欣賞阿里山櫻花的浪漫美景</li>
              <li><strong>森林步道</strong> - 在森林中健行，呼吸新鮮空氣</li>
            </ul>

            <h3>文化體驗</h3>
            <p>阿里山不僅有美麗的自然景觀，也有豐富的文化內涵。從原住民文化到鐵路文化，從茶文化到森林文化，每一種都讓我對台灣有了更深的認識。</p>

            <h3>心靈收穫</h3>
            <p>在阿里山的寧靜環境中，我有機會靜下心來思考人生和未來。這次旅行不僅讓我欣賞到了美麗的風景，也讓我獲得了心靈上的洗禮和成長。</p>
```
